## Question 1. 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
diamonds
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = price, colour = cut)) +
    geom_histogram(colour = "black", fill = "aquamarine", bins = 17) +
    facet_wrap(~cut)
```

## Question 2. 
```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = price, colour = cut)) +
    geom_histogram(colour = "black", fill = "aquamarine", bins = 17) +
    facet_wrap(~cut) +
  theme(plot.background = element_rect("tomato"),
        axis.text = element_text(colour = "blue4"))

```
